alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 26 at 3:35PM MST until February 26 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. the strongest winds will occur across the western sections of Pueblo county, especially the northwestern sections including Pueblo West. * WHERE...Pueblo Vicinity/Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet County. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
